If you support #HR1, you support: 

A 6:1 government match to any small donor contributions of $200 or less in a Congressional or Presidential campaign. Meaning, for every $200 donated, the federal government will use hard-earned taxpayer dollars to match $1,200.

If you support #HR1, you support: 

An inappropriate use of federal workers and taxpayer dollars by granting federal employees 6 days of paid vacation to serve as poll watchers.

If you support #HR1, you support: 

Changing the make up of the Federal Election Commission (FEC) from a balanced 3-3 ratio to a partisan 3-2 ratio. This gives the President the final say over election law violations.

If you support #HR1, you support: 

Giving any candidate for office the ability to sue to dispute the results of any election regardless of the margin of victory.

If you support #HR1, you support: 

Violating constitutional rights under the first amendment by expanding the definition of political speech & increasing the power of the federal government to control it.
